feed.title: CS@Ashoka
feed.subtitle: CS@Ashoka, maintained by the Department Representatives, is your go-to resource for all things Computer Science at Ashoka University. Explore course materials, project showcases, internship opportunities, and more, all curated to enhance your academic journey.

entry.title: Paper Presentation by Vansh Bothra at MobileHCI, Egypt

link.title: Paper Presentation by Vansh Bothra at MobileHCI, Egypt

entry.summary: Highlighting research presented at the MobileHCI Conference in Egypt on inclusive e-commerce design and digital accessibility.

entry.title: Vaani Goenka’s Research on Program Verification Accepted at ACM COMPUTE

link.title: Vaani Goenka’s Research on Program Verification Accepted at ACM COMPUTE

entry.summary: Highlighting Vaani Goenka’s research on automated verification and program correctness, her acceptance at ACM COMPUTE, and her recognition through the RSR Grant for Women in STEM.

entry.title: From the India Conference at Harvard Hackathon to PReMI 2025

link.title: From the India Conference at Harvard Hackathon to PReMI 2025

entry.summary: Highlighting research that originated at the India Conference at Harvard Policy Hackathon and was later published and presented at the International Conference on Pattern Recognition and Machine Intelligence (PReMI).

entry.title: Roshni Agarwal Wins ESET Women in Cybersecurity Scholarship

link.title: Roshni Agarwal Wins ESET Women in Cybersecurity Scholarship

entry.summary: Celebrating Roshni Agarwal's achievement in receiving the prestigious ESET Women in Cybersecurity Scholarship for her exceptional work and potential in cybersecurity.
